channel.title: Vps help
channel.description: I know this may sound like a noob question, but i am stuck on trying to figure it out, i just bought a vps from vpsland, and i got the ip, i have windows and when i do the windows remote desktop connection, it connects, and then it wont log me in (i am using my root password i believe) if anyone can help then thank you very much, been trying for last 3 hours :mad:

item.title: Vps help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You have to use the password that you chose when registering unless clicked the box to use a separate password.

Username: Administrator
Password: (Your password when registered)

Read full topic
